item.title: I want that screen!
item.dc:creator: Xavier Damman
item.content:encoded:
This is not a screen, but a wall! It's so big. Actually maybe too big. It's fully touchable and has got a pretty interface that allows you to watch TV, listen to music, change the background, and other stuffs. It's really worth it to watch the demo. The screen is so big that you always have to walk a few meters to click the next button on the interface :-D Who has said that technology makes people lazier? What a beautiful world!
Don't ask me the price for it, you won't be able to afford it anyway!
